alert.note: Alert for Darlington; Dillon (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 4:46PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Dillon and eastern Darlington Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 445 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Darlington Raceway, or near Darlington, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Darlington, Dovesville, Mechanicsville, Mont Clare, Darlington Raceway, Floyd, Swift Creek, Oak Grove, Oats and Florence Darlington Technical College Main Campus. This includes the following highways... Interstate 20 between mile markers 130 and 139. Interstate 95 in South Carolina near mile marker 146, near mile marker 167, and between mile markers 175 and 181. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
